sentences.english: Did their parents check up on their whereabouts and set curfews?
sentences.chinese: 他們的父母會調查他們的行蹤並實施宵禁嗎？

sentences.english: In Cairo, thousands of demonstrators have ignored a curfew.
sentences.chinese: 在開羅，上千個遊行者無視宵禁的存在。

sentences.english: Myanmar issued on Tuesday night a curfew order in the country's biggest city of Yangon.
sentences.chinese: 緬甸昨晚在該國最年夜都會仰光公告宵禁令。

sentences.english: The military government clamped a curfew onto the capital.
sentences.chinese: 軍事政府強力執行宵禁令。

sentences.english: A curfew imposed ahead of the judgment remains in place.
sentences.chinese: 在審判前執行的全國宵禁令仍沒有取消。

sentences.english: Houston remains under a nighttime curfew.
sentences.chinese: 休斯敦仍然實行夜間宵禁。

sentences.english: Curfews and blackouts even lasted to July 1945.
sentences.chinese: 宵禁和燈火管制甚至持續到了1945年7月。

sentences.english: Authorities have imposed a three-day curfew in the capital to contain the clashes.
sentences.chinese: 首都巴格達已開始實施爲期三天的宵禁以遏制衝突。

sentences.english: The curfew, bare red arm, for whom I brake the blood street.
sentences.chinese: 宵禁，裸赤臂，我爲誰剎血街頭。

sentences.english: Earlier, he imposed an immediate overnight curfew on Abidjan.
sentences.chinese: 此前，他下令立即在阿比讓實施夜間宵禁。

sentences.english: Militias will be used to control rioting and force order, with curfews established.
sentences.chinese: 民兵會用來鎮壓暴亂及執行命令，執行宵禁令。

sentences.english: He returned in his car after curfew and attempted to run them down.
sentences.chinese: 在宵禁開始之後他回到他的汽車裏並追殺過來。

sentences.english: He also re-established a law permitting local governments to order curfews .
sentences.chinese: 他同時重建法律允許當地政府實行宵禁。

sentences.english: The hour was his (real) girlfriend's self-imposed curfew, since she had to get up early for school.
sentences.chinese: 這個時間是H的女朋友因爲要趕早上課而自行的宵禁。

sentences.english: There is a curfew for minors under the age of 18.
sentences.chinese: 對十八歲以下的未成年人是有宵禁令的。

sentences.english: The Bauchi state governor imposed a night-time curfew as a result.
sentences.chinese: Bauchi州州長最終決定實施宵禁。

definition: to impose martial law/to impose emergency measures
to lift a ban/to lift a curfew
to hold a lamp/to light a lamp
Imperial City, inner part of Beijing, with the Forbidden City at its center
